The claim was shared on Facebook on Octo: 2020, and has been shared almost 100 times.
The Tagalog: language post translates to English and mentions that President Ferdinand Marcos and Dr. Jose Rizal established and founded the World Bank and International Monetary Fund (IMF).
The claim cites Karen Hudes: a former World Bank lawyer and whistleblower, as the source of the information.
The World Bank and IMF websites state th: contradicting the claim that they were established by Rizal and Marcos. Additionally, the World Bank has discredited Karen Hudes and stated that she is not authorized to represent the organization.
